sentence: A "race-neutral" congressional map drawn by Florida Republican Governor Ron DeSantis that would have eliminated a Black district in a northern part of the state has been struck down by a DeSantis-appointed circuit court judge who found the redistricting plan unconstitutional.
author: Patricia McKnight
title: DeSantis-Appointed Judge Blocks His 'Unconstitutional' Redistricting Map

author: Kenny Stancil
title: Florida Judge Strikes Down Part of 'Unconstitutional' Map Rigged by GOP Gov. DeSantis

author: David Edwards
title: DeSantis-appointed judge declares Florida redistricting map unconstitutional over Black voter suppression

author: Keith Reed
title: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis Voting Map Ruled Unconstitutional

sentence: RELATED: Ron DeSantis wants to hijack Florida redistricting and cut number of Black districts in half "The judge recognizes that this map is unlawful and diminishes African Americans' ability to elect representatives of their choice," Lawson said in a statement to the Associated Press after the hearing.
author: Igor Derysh
title: DeSantis-appointed judge says his map is an unconstitutional assault on Black voting power

author: BRENDAN FARRINGTON
title: Florida appeals court reinstates DeSantis congressional map

author: Caroline Vakil
title: Florida appeals court reinstates DeSantiss congressional map
